channel.title: The NeuroBlog - Articles
channel.description: The official blog of the Graduate Students' Association in Neuroscience at McGill University.

item.title: The PhD Starter Kit
item.description:
Welcome back everybody from the Holidays and Happy New Year! Now that you are refreshed and ready to tackle your research, what better way to help you get started in the best way possible than a productivity post? Nothing, we should say! So here you go!
Our first post of the year is a guest post, written by Achintya Rao, a science communicator for CERN in Geneva on the CMS experiment and a second year PhD student. The post covers everything from general task management, to making presentations, and even coding. Enjoy!
To find out more about PhD life in general, and physics in particular, follow Achintya Rao on Twitter, Google+, and LinkedIn.

-Anastasia and Katrine
